Katie had never been able to visualize, however, just how much weight she’s gained. When she first saw Tammy waiting for her at the airport, she didn’t even recognize her at first! Well, of course, at least until her aunt rushed forward and wrapped her in a big bear hug…

She would never forget that hug. She had only had a single moment to brace herself before those tubby arms wrapped around her, and the air was squeezed from her lungs as she was completely consumed by the tubby softness. Tammy had hugged her like a teddy bear, lifting her up in the air slightly as she pressed the girl against her plump body, cooing as she rocked her back and forth. Katie couldn’t even protest, her face smothered against the woman’s busty chest. It seemed miserable at the time… but when it was over, Katie was strangely disappointed it had to end.

”Welcome to Oregon, honey!” Tammy had smiled, a huge smile spreading across her pudgy face. ”It’s so good to see you!”

Yep. Katie’s mother was doing some sort of rehab program off in another country, so Katie got flown all the way across the country to spend some time at her aunt’s ranch. They had phrased it as a fun little trip… but what was supposed to be so fun about it? There was no internet, no cable… just lingering around in the middle of nowhere, watching cows graze. At least it had some beautiful sights. Just glancing out the window, there was rolling hills, beautiful fields and noble mountains in the distance.

Tammy’s little house on the ranch was small and dusty. The animals had better accommodations, to be honest. It looked sort of like a log cabin, and there were a few deer heads, antlers, and assorted other hunting trophies mountain all over the walls, with skins on the couch and beds. Your aunt was never a hunter, so Katie assumes these strange decorations must be the work of her uncle, rest his soul.

It’s been less than week since she came here, and already, Katie is running out of things to do. She was lying on the couch at the moment, rereading a boring old romance novel she found around the house, all curled up in thick blankets. Her heart’s not really in it, though. Every so often, her aunt’s big bear hug seems to intrude into her mind. For some reason, the sensation of being squished up so tightly against all that soft plumpness, to the point that she could barely breathe… well, let’s just say she was almost hoping it would happen again.

Speak of the devil, she heard loud, heavy footsteps approaching, signifying that Tammy is drawing near. ”Katie?” Tammy called for her. ”Katie, where are you?” For some reason, Katie just froze up, not wanting to answer. After waiting for a few moments, her aunt just shrugged. ”Guess she went outside…” Giving up on finding her, her aunt walked over to the couch… and Katie’s heart started to flutter when she realized the woman was going to sit down! Tammy must not notice her there, what with all the blankets.

Katie had the opportunity to stop this. She could cry out, make her presence known at the last second. But, for some reason, she doesn’t. She just let's it happen, excitement brewing in her chest. Tammy is alarmed when she sits down on something more solid than she expected, and hears a pained grunt beneath her. She looked down, only to see Katie’s upper body poking out from beneath her butt. She had accidentally sat on the girl! Katie let out a little grunt as the air was knocked from her lungs, as she feels the weight of the woman’s giant butt plop itself onto her back.

To Katie’s surprise, instead of immediately standing up, the plump woman just giggled. ”Oh! Hehe! There you are!” She smiled, placing a hand over her mouth. ”I was wondering where you ran off to! Thought you could hide from ol’ Tammy, huh?” Katie shuddered a bit, feeling her back crack with every move Tammy made. The weight bearing down on her was intense… but since there were plush couch pillows beneath her, it was bearable.

”Uh… yeah… hah…” She muttered nervously, her face blushing beet red. She was confused by her own feelings. ”Are you gonna… uh… get off…?”

Tammy giggled again, tapping her chin. ”I dunno! You’re actually pretty comfy!” She teased, leaning back and pressing more weight down on Katie’s back. The woman could tell that the girl didn’t really mind getting sat on, but what she couldn’t tell was just how excited it made Katie.

”Oh… um… thanks…” She could feel the contours of the woman’s squishy, plump butt dig into the small of her back, slowly squishing the breath out of her more and more. At this point, her head felt woozy, and there were butterflies in her stomach. It didn’t seem like the woman was getting up any time soon, and Katie didn’t know how much longer she could deal with these confusing feelings. ”So… what were you calling me for?”

Tammy had been enjoying just how surprisingly comfortable her niece was… but perked up when she spoke again, reminded of what she came here for. ”Oh! Yes!” She nodded. ”Uh, I sort of lost something. I need to know if you’ve seen a little golden bell around here anywhere…”

Katie shook her head… well, as best she could, considering just how restrained she was. ”No…”

”Well… could you be a dear and keep an eye out for it? I really can’t afford to lose it…” Tammy sighed. Before their conversation can continue, the old grandfather clock rings loudly in another room. ”Oh! Hah! Looks like it’s already time for supper! How time flies…” Katie was almost disappointed when Tammy stood up, finally lifting her weight off of the girl’s back. As Tammy trotted off into the kitchen, Katie sat up, still feeling a little dizzy and sore. Why was she blushing so much?

She tried to shake these thoughts from her mind, instead focusing on what Tammy had said. A golden bell? What would she need with something like that? She considers where such a thing might’ve been lost...

info.brief_description: Just a collection of a bunch of stories about BBW squashing skinny females.
info.description:
Write a story about a BBW squash a skinny girl. There are no age restrictions. Although please don't make the squasher an obese 2 year old (notice I didn't say anything about a squashee). Also please don't make the squasher or squashee a 90 year old grandma. Other than that any age is fine. It can be from either the squasher or the squashee's perspective, it doesn't matter to me.

RULES:
1.) No toilet stuff
2.) No eating (I will only allow this if you do put in quite a bit of squashing)
3.) No racism
4.) No one sentence stories (has to be atleast 8 sentences, I will let some cases slide though if you have a good story.)
5.) Make sure the reader can understand what is going on.
6.) Try to refrain from shrinking/growing (Just like the eating thing, as long as it has good squashing in it. I will be fine)
7.) Preferably now boy squashee's (If you must, you better put some darn good squashing in there)
8.) No male on male stuff
9.) Fat male on skinny female is fine too. (Remember, good squashing)
10.) Animals squashing girls is allowed to. (elephants, horses, cows, pigs, etc.) (Remember the no shrinking/growing rule.)
11.) ENJOY!

As for now that is all. Please enjoy and add many chapters to the story.
